pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, January 29, 2016:

The Prime Minister will visit the community of La Loche, Saskatchewan with Ministers Ralph Goodale, Jody Wilson-Raybould and Jane Philpott, Saskatchewan Premier Brad Wall, National Chief Perry Bellegarde and Chief Bobby Cameron, Mayor Kevin Janvier and MP Georgina Jolibois.

Please note that all times are local.

La Loche

11:45 a.m. CST The Prime Minister will meet with community leaders at the Ducharme Elementary School.

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. CST The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Methy Place
84 La Loche Avenue
La Loche, Saskatchewan

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
